column4: hey all. anybody help me connecting to the ethernet through terminal #ubuntu 10.04
wireless or just ethernet?
wired (eth0)
Did you try dhclient eth0.
not the wireless... i am getting some weird error when i give commands like "sudo ifup eth0" or "sudo ifdown eth0)
no i didnt
shal i tell ya the error that i am getting here?
shows ifconfig the nic to be up?
Techbreak: yes.
sudo eth0
igonoring unknown einterface eth0=eth0
ifdown: interface eth0 not configured
sudo eth0 is no command, try sudo ifconfig eth0 upinstead.
do you want the ifconfig output too?
Techbreak: if eth0 is listed it is fine i gess
yeah it is listed and "lo" too
okei i ll try that command n get back to you.. brb... i have to disconnect here...
is there a up also in the second line.
not done
what do you mean not done/
didnt work at all... no output for the command "sudo ifconfig eth0 up"
didnt work at all.. i didnt get any output but still the internet did not connect
